reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 90/20: EXTENDING TIME PERIODS FOR ACCESSIBLE PARKING PERMITS
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXTENDING TIME PERIODS FOR ACCESSIBLE PARKING PERMITS
reg_info.act_under: Highway Traffic Act   Code de la route

content.section: Extending time periods for accessible parking permits
content.content: 1. The period of time that an accessible parking permit is in force is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the permit expired or would expire on or after March 17, 2020.
content.raw_html: 1. The period of time that an accessible parking permit is in force is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the permit expired or would expire on or after March 17, 2020.

content.section: Extending time periods for accessible parking permits
content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
